subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Steve Hultay Files/Steve Hultay's Frank's Box #27/hatred_from_us---it's_the_big_caper.mp3 
  Uploaded by : urkel232002 <urkel23@...> 
  Description : "Hatred from us, it's the big caper"---Doesn't make sense, but i think that's what they said. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Steve%20Hultay%20Files/Steve%20Hultay%27s%20Frank%27s%20Box%20%2327/hatred_from_us---it%27s_the_big_caper.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

urkel232002 <urkel23@...>
